attributes.action: stop this incinerator our area is high cancer area anyway recycling is cheaper healthier
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i wish to objrct to cyclamax building an incierator on raynesway resource park derby /my grounds are they pose a threat to my health  as small partices of sulphur dioxin cannot be stopped escaping .and im concerned for unborn children .who could be born abnormal /also im concerned about global warming  these incinerators add to it the goverment tell us to recycle .then do the oposite  please stop this incinerator spondon derby already has high cancer rates .thank you peter ambler

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
